title: Advise a Buyer Interested in a FSBO
description: A buyer represented by an agent wants to make an offer on a home being sold 'For Sale By Owner' (FSBO).

tasks.description: Contact the FSBO seller to introduce yourself and confirm they are willing to cooperate with a buyer's agent and pay a commission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent establishes communication and confirms commission agreement.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer on the risks and nuances of dealing with an unrepresented seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer is well-informed about the process.

tasks.description: Draft and submit the purchase offer directly to the seller, explaining the terms clearly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The offer is submitted and explained to the unrepresented seller.
